title: 3 and Out - Cowboys Collapse; Bears' Trubisky Decision; Tepper's Rivera Firing; CEO HC's Dying; USC Settles; Full Week 14 Preview
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Cowboys Collapse; Bears' Trubisky Decision; Tepper's Rivera Firing; CEO HC's Dying; USC Settles; Full Week 14 Preview
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff looks at the Cowboys collapsing on TNF in a bad loss to the Bears, Mitchell Trubisky complicating the Bears decision on him by playing well, why he was impressed with how Panthers owner David Tepper handled the firing of Ron Rivera, why the CEO head coach - who isn't directly in charge of one side of the ball - are a dying breed, and why USC is a shell of its former dominating self. He also previews the full slate of Week 14 games and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
